00014 #ifndef U_MOD_TSA_H
00015 #define U_MOD_TSA_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/server/server_plugin.h>
00018 
00019 /*
00020 The plugin interface is an integral part of UServer which provides a flexible way to add specific functionality to UServer.
00021 Plugins allow you to enhance the functionality of UServer without changing the core of the server. They can be loaded at
00022 startup time and can change virtually some aspect of the behaviour of the server.
00023 
00024 UServer has 5 hooks which are used in different states of the execution of the request:
00025 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 * Server-wide hooks:
00027 ````````````````````
00028 1) handlerConfig: called when the server finished to process its configuration
00029 2) handlerInit:   called when the server finished its init, and before start to run
00030 
00031 * Connection-wide hooks:
00032 ````````````````````````
00033 3) handlerRead:
00034 4) handlerRequest:
00035 5) handlerReset:
00036   called in `UClientImage_Base::handlerRead()`
00037 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 
00039 RETURNS:
00040   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_GO_ON         if ok
00041   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_FINISHED if the final output is prepared
00042   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_AGAIN    if the request is empty (NONBLOCKING)
00043 
00044   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_ERROR         on error
00045 */
00046 
00047 class UCommand;
00048 
00049 class U_EXPORT UTsaPlugIn : public UServerPlugIn {
00050 public:
00051 
00052         // COSTRUTTORI
00053 
00054         UTsaPlugIn()
00055                 {
00056                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTsaPlugIn, "", 0)
00057                 }
00058 
00059         virtual ~UTsaPlugIn();
00060 
00061         // define method VIRTUAL of class UServerPlugIn
00062 
00063         // Server-wide hooks
00064 
00065         virtual int handlerConfig(UFileConfig& cfg);
00066 
00067         virtual int handlerInit()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE(0, "UTsaPlugIn::init()")
00070 
00071                 U_RETURN(U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_GO_ON);
00072                 }
00073 
00074         // Connection-wide hooks
00075 
00076         virtual int handlerRead()
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(0, "UTsaPlugIn::handlerRead()")
00079 
00080                 U_RETURN(U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_GO_ON);
00081                 }
00082 
00083         virtual int handlerRequest();
00084         virtual int handlerReset()
00085                 {
00086                 U_TRACE(0, "UTsaPlugIn::handlerReset()")
00087 
00088                 U_RETURN(U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_GO_ON);
00089                 }
00090 
00091         // DEBUG
00092 
00093 #ifdef DEBUG
00094         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00095 #endif
00096 
00097 protected:
00098         UCommand* command;
00099 
00100 private:
00101         UTsaPlugIn(const UTsaPlugIn&) : UServerPlugIn() {}
00102         UTsaPlugIn& operator=(const UTsaPlugIn&)                   { return *this; }
00103 };
00104 
00105 #endif
